sentence.Network_en: Pyroxene is exclusively diopsidic augite, with a composition relatively colse to the diopside - hedenbergite join.
sentence.Network_cn: 所有辉石是透辉石质普通辉石, 其成分相对近于透辉石 -- 镁铁辉石.

sentence.Network_en: Jadeite jade consists of minerals of pyroxene, amphibole and feldspar groups.
sentence.Network_cn: 翡翠由辉石族 、 角闪石族、长石族矿物组成.

sentence.Network_en: A usually coarse - grained igneous rock composed chiefly of calcic plagioclase and pyroxene.
sentence.Network_cn: 一种辉石矿物,由锂铝硅酸盐组成,是锂的来源.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from pyro- 'fire' + Greek xenos 'stranger' (because the mineral group was supposed alien to igneous rocks)

means.word_mean: 1. any of a group of crystalline silicate mineral common in igneous and metamorphic rocks
